column1: Traffic reports will resume Monday April 1 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: US-27S at Old Lexington Rd in Garrard Co:
column4: All southbound lanes are shut down until further notice due to investigation of a serious collision.

column3: US-27S at Old Lexington Rd in Garrard Co:
column4: Southbound traffic is being diverted to the left lane of the northbound side.  One lane is open for northbound traffic.
In effect from April 1 at 8 p.m. to April 2 at 8 p.m.
